ref: 4724 *cavati ʻ says ʼ, cavyā -- f. ʻ voice ʼ lex. 2. *cāvayati caus. [Connexion with káuti ʻ shouts ʼ improbable: onom. cf. jápati?]
Pk. cavaï, pp. ˚via -- ʻ says ʼ, cavēṇa -- n. ʻ saying ʼ, cavacava -- m. ʻ a sort of noise ʼ;
S. cavaṇu, cuaṇu, pp. cayo ʻ to say, tell ʼ, caviṇī f. ʻ saying, order ʼ;
G. cavvũ ʻ to speak, narrate ʼ.
